item.title: Broken Fence, Clapham Common West Side, 3rd July
item.description:
The small wooden fence, fencing off the small area of land near the abandoned bowling green cafe, along Clapham Common West Side has been broken for many (at least 6) months. This is not just unsightly but itâ€™s a danger to children and others using the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Clapham Common West Side, Balham, London
